column18: 03/05/2015: An assailant attacked Mark Lippert with a knife in Seoul city, Seoul province, South Korea. Lippert, the United Stated (US) Ambassador to South Korea, was injured in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources attributed the attack to an individual, identified as Kim Ki-Jong.
column39: Ambassador to South Korea: Mark Lippert
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources posited that Kim Ki-Jong, the individual who carried out the attack, opposed military operations that the United States and South Korea jointly conduct.
column97: A kitchen knife was used in the attack.
